title: DDFP 631: Divisional Round picks, Willie McGinest & Lorenzo Alexander
itunes:title: DDFP 631: Divisional Round picks, Willie McGinest & Lorenzo Alexander
description:
Dave Dameshek is first joined by Willie McGinest to break down the controversy surrounding the New England Patriots, discussing which parts of the ESPN story may have some truth behind them and which assertions he completely shuts down (3:38). Also, McGinest revisits his memorable 2003 playoffs matchup against the Tennessee Titans (22:00). Then, Shek is joined by Matt “Money” Smith, Cynthia Frelund and Bills LB Lorenzo Alexander to make their Red Challenge Flag picks for this weekend’s slate of divisional round matchups (54:07). Plus, Money reads a new batch of Eddie Spaghetti’s tweets (42:40) and the guys listen to a couple of voicemails left by relatives of Producers Kent Brown and Erica Tamposi (47:38).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
